p: Glutathione is a natural antioxidant that neutralizes harmful ROS produced in normal cells, and its consumption plays a central role in cell death. 7,8-diacetoxy-3-(4-methylsulfonyl phenyl) coumarin (compound 5f) synthesized by Musa can consume glutathione, leading to excessive accumulation of ROS in prostate cancer cells and inducing apoptosis caused by oxidative stress ( 29).
